title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 has a usage of the Class.forName() method.
EB: To improve the BidiUtil class in win32 and prevent unnecessary instantiation, add a private constructor. Since there are no nonstatic methods in this class, it is not required to have a public constructor. This will not increase the size of the class and will provide better encapsulation.
SR: Modify the BidiUtil class in win32 to have a private constructor to prevent unnecessary instantiation. Update the code to use the private constructor instead of Class.forName() for better encapsulation.
